categories: Category:Victory I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Gallant was a Victory I-class Star Destroyer that saw service with the Republic Navy and later in the Imperial Navy.

The ship first saw action at the end of the Clone Wars as a part of Jedi Master Roan Shryne's attack force during the Battle of Murkhana. It continued to serve in the Imperial Navy, and saw service during the Galactic Civil War.
